Cards.name: Eustass"Captain"Kid
Cards.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn]  ③ (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your cost area.) You may trash 1 card from your hand: Set this Leader as active.

Cards.name: Urouge
Cards.effect: [DON!! x1] If you have 3 or more Characters, this card gains +2000 power.

Cards.name: Capone"Gang"Bege
Cards.effect: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

Cards.name: Killer
Cards.effect: [On Play] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

Cards.name: Jewelry Bonney
Cards.effect: [Activate: Main] ➀ (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your cost area.) You may rest this Character: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Supernovas} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

Cards.name: Scratchmen Apoo
Cards.effect: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's DON!! cards.

Cards.name: Trafalgar Law
Cards.effect: [On Play] Set up to 1 of your {Supernovas} or {Heart Pirates} type rested Characters with a cost of 5 or less as active.

Cards.name: Basil Hawkins
Cards.effect: [DON!! x1] [Once Per Turn] [Your Turn] If this Character battles your opponent's Character, set this card as active.

Cards.name: Eustass"Captain"Kid
Cards.effect: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)<br

Cards.name: X.Drake
Cards.effect: [DON!! x1] [Your Turn] If this Character is rested, your {Supernovas} or {Navy} type Leaders and Characters gain +1000 power.

Cards.name: Scalpel
Cards.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.

Cards.name: Repel
Cards.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.

Cards.name: Straw Sword
Cards.effect: [Main] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters.
